"In the Driving Rain 2":
"An unending storm is battering the
Naberian forest. The planet's weather
patterns are highly variable, so such bad
weather for so long has to mean
something. All ARKS ops are to get ready
to sortie ASAP. Scope out the situation
and investigate the strange weather.

――――――――――――――――――――
Collect [1000] Quest Points to clear
Failure: Be defeated in the final area. time limit expires. "
